title: Chromium, please ensure LocalLinks are supported
body: Browsers like Firefox and Chrome think it is a security vulnerability to support linking to LocalLinks (i.e. file://COMPUTER_NAME/FILESHARE/FILE.pdf"). Very short sighted for corporate environments that will have a ton of legacy applications that still link to local network resources via the file:// scheme.

comments.body: Same here! Working a DOD product and it DOES NOT WORK ON CHROMIUM EDGE. Think about that!!!!

Same here. Our users of SharePoint search will kill us if the file system links in the search results - which are plenty - aren't klickable anymore! Frankly, I don't get what's the security vulnerability here.
We Use SharePoint Searchapplikation with ContentSource Fileserver. Searchfrontend has millions of file:// links. I don't hope we need Internet Explorer forever!!
